COMPANIES.MINIMUM_DATA:
To create a business it is necessary to indicate its name and type.

You will be able to complete the rest of the information from the business administration view.

Your business will not be visible to users until you mark it as published from the business administration view.

COMPANIES.NO_ASSESSMENTS: They have not yet rated your business

FILTERS_MODAL.MANDATORY_END_DATE: You must choose an end date if you choose start date
FILTERS_MODAL.LOCATION_NEEDED: You must allow access to your location in order to order by distance from current position.
FILTERS_MODAL.LOCATION_NEEDED_FILTER: You must allow access to your location in order to filter by distance from current position.

COMPANIES.ALREADY_BOOSTED: You already enjoy a positioning improvement in your business, you will be able to renew it as of {{ date }}
COMPANIES.MUST_BE_PUBLISHED: Before improving the positioning of your business you must publish it

BOOST_FACTOR_FORM.BODY: You are going to improve the positioning of your business by {{ boostFactor }}% for a cost of {{ cost }} €/month, choose the improvement period

APPOINTMENTS.NAME: Name
APPOINTMENTS.CANCEL_CREATED_BY_MANAGER: This appointment is from a customer with no application, if cancelled you will not be notified.
APPOINTMENTS.DELETE_AND_WASAP: Cancel appointment and notify by WhatsApp
APPOINTMENTS.GMAIL_NEEDED: You need a Gmail email associated with your account to export your appointments to Google Calendar.

CALENDAR.NO_APPOINTMENTS: There are no appointments for the selected day

USE_TERMS.ACCEPT: I accept the terms and conditions of use

TUTORIAL.SEE_AGAIN: You can view the tutorial again from your personal profile
TUTORIAL.1: Easily navigate between the view of your appointments, business and your profile with the bottom menu tabs

user.2-top: With just one click sort the business listing
user.2-bot: Sort by rating from other customers, distance from your current location or time to appointment.
user.3-bot: Where you can combine the necessary filters to find the business you are looking for
user.4-bot: From the page of each business you can request the first available appointment or choose your appointment for the right moment
user.5-bot: You can consult your requested appointments, navigate to them to modify them or export them to Google Calendar
user.6-bot: You can configure when to receive notifications on your phone from the personal profile.

manager.2-bot: You will only need to indicate the name and type, you can optionally upload an image, it will not be visible initially
manager.3-bot: Complete the rest of the necessary information and publish your business so that it is visible to users
manager.4-bot: You can add periods with special opening hours and define the opening hours for each day of the week
manager.5-bot: You can view and manage appointments for a business, you can also request appointments for customers without an application
manager.6-bot: You can check your business appointments, navigate to them to modify them or export them to Google Calendar.
manager.7-bot: You can configure when to receive notifications on your phone from the personal profile.
